title: Research-Based Mobile Microlearning to Strengthen Doctoral Students' Instructional Design Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Teaching competency enhancement course for pre-service or in-service teachers; mobile-optimized instructional design capability development program for PhD-level corporate managers/leaders

learning_goals: Learners can design effective lecture materials by applying research-based instructional design principles.
Learners can develop at least three microlearning content structures (5-minute modules) suitable for mobile environments.
Learners can measure educational effectiveness with over 80% accuracy using formative assessment tools (quizzes, case analyses).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
